name: The HelmsCrab
description:
Go on an epic and dramatic journey as a crab who helms a submarine.

If you're stuck, click here for hints. If you're REALLY stuck click here for solutions.

It has been reported that the game's audio is not functioning properly on "Brave" browser.

This game was created for ZenoJam 6 for the theme "Going Up". 

While the music, voice-over, submarine and most of the 3d objects were created during the game-jam, some third party assets were used for the in-game animals, textures, shaders and sounds:

  • 10 Texture Sets INDUSTRIAL 02 by ANGRY ANT ENTERTAINMENT
  • [Low Poly] Animated Sea Animals Vol.1 by Jiffycrew
  • Mobile Depth Water Shader by Valakh Pavel
  • Low Poly Animated Animals by polyperfect
  • Ultimate SFX bundle by SIDEARM STUDIOS
  • Low Poly Rock Pack by Broken Vector
  • Fmod
